title: (x) The Game "Doctor's Advocate" album cover script - hand lettered {Lex}
content:
Thought it was a Highground Industries font, but can’t find it anywhere...can someone please help?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071227091659im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/DoctorsAdvocate_6386.jpg)

 [‹ (x) New York Magazine condensed headline face - Elderkin {Yves, Marc O}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071227091659/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34788 "Go to previous forum topic") [Trying to mimic Andy Warhol classic Campbell's Soup painting ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071227091659/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34808 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nevelle flynn

comments.content:
The ’A’s, ’O’s, ’C’s, and ’T’s are all different from each other which means that this is either a font with lots of opentype features and alternates, or more likely, drawn by hand.

- Lex
i kind of thought it was drawn by hand as well, hopefully it’s not hand drawn though

What’s the source of this text? Is there any more where it came from?

- Lex

well it’s just that, it’s on this album cover

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071227091659im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/TheGame_DoctorsAdvocate_4111.jpg)

[Rian Hughes](http://web.archive.org/web/20071227091659/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Rian%252BHughes)’ [Chantal](http://web.archive.org/web/20071227091659/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/device_fonts/chantal/) has a similar energy to it.
